segments.text: Did you have any working experience during college ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I did some part-time jobs such as English tutor , salesman , and model .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What did you learn from your part-time jobs ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I learned to be patient , professional and gained a ll of experience of direct sales .
segments.speaker: S2
